EmailTemplate.name: Test New Domains 1a.Test Marketing IP
EmailTemplate.subject: Testing Marketing Domain
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Everyone’s at home. So why aren’t more people using your online banking or app?
This free, editable campaign kit will fix that.
(Because they can’t use what they don’t know about.) ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Did you know?
You can get free marketing campaign toolkits, customizable campaigns, videos, research reports and more to help {{company.Company Name:default=your financial institution}} differentiate with digital. Start here. <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/2020/digital-transformation]]>
